name: Wild Hat West
description:
Fight waves of enemies and bosses to earn gold nuggets and buy new upgrades with them. Don't forget to find the hidden trophies. And most importantly, try not to lose your hats! Key features:
  • More than 10 different hats.
  • Multiple upgrades and trophies to unlock.
  • Five enemy types to fight.
  • One epic boss battle.
  • Insane pixel art.
Controls: Shoot Mouse right click Reload Mouse middle click Switch weapon Mouse left click Move Arrow keys Credits: Game and Pixel Art (except sand texture) by Makzim3D. SFX:
